definition: silk/thread/trace/(cuisine) shreds or julienne strips/CL:條|条[tiao2]/classifier: a thread (of cloud, smoke etc), a bit, an iota, a hint (of sth) etc

sentences.english: The walls are partly destroyed, however, the forge grids remain.
sentences.chinese: 牆體已有部分毀壞，然而，窗戶的鐵絲網還在。

sentences.english: They live inside the wire, in the middle of nowhere, separated from the civilian population.
sentences.chinese: 他們生活在鐵絲網內，無處可藏，與平民百姓隔離。

sentences.english: Hoarfrost on a wire fence in the US state of Iowa.
sentences.chinese: 美國愛荷華州鐵絲網上的白霜。

sentences.english: Giant loops of barbed wire lie rusting in the surf.
sentences.chinese: 巨大的一圈圈的帶刺鐵絲網在海浪中生鏽。

sentences.english: Prior to this, Kitagawa has been the county seat around the barbed wire fence.
sentences.chinese: 在此之前，一直是北川縣城周圍的鐵絲網。

sentences.english: They have to crawl under yards and yards of barbed wire.
sentences.chinese: 在這一項目中，挑戰者需要在帶刀片的鐵絲網下爬行。

sentences.english: Events behind the barbed wire at Fort Bragg continue to polarise opinion.
sentences.chinese: 在後面的布拉格堡鐵絲網活動繼續分化的意見。

sentences.english: But their words helped pierce the concrete and concertina wire of the Iron Curtain.
sentences.chinese: 但是這些話穿透了鐵幕的水泥牆和鐵絲網。

sentences.english: Still have property of guard against theft additionally, vitreous lacerate still has abatis to hold back.
sentences.chinese: 另外還有防盜性能，玻璃割破還有鐵絲網阻擋。

sentences.english: I looked across the wire at the Austrian lines.
sentences.chinese: 我隔着鐵絲網望望奧軍的陣地。

sentences.english: Raine looked throught the mesh and saw his old captain.
sentences.chinese: 雷恩透過鐵絲網看到了他的老隊長。

sentences.english: The forest was protected by barbed wire and by defensive positions built of steel and concrete.
sentences.chinese: 森林是保護和鐵絲網的鋼鐵和混凝土建成的防禦陣地。

sentences.english: By night, the perimeter wire was illumined by lights.
sentences.chinese: 到了夜裏，周遭的鐵絲網都被燈光照亮。

sentences.english: Lines of police stood guard by barbed-wire barricades.
sentences.chinese: 警察列隊在鐵絲網路障旁站崗守衛。

sentences.english: Back and forth I walk next to the barbed wire fence, trying to keep my emaciated body warm.
sentences.chinese: 我沿着鐵絲網來回走，想暖和一下我瘦弱的身體。

sentences.english: The whale carcass left by the Inupiaq whale hunters is surrounded by a barbed wire fence.
sentences.chinese: 捕獵人留下的依努皮亞鯨魚殘骸被一個鐵絲網包圍住。

definition: window with an iron grating (apartment etc)/barred window of a prison cell
cheval de frise (a type of barrier)
